org.jmisb.api.video

Interface IVideoInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IVideoFileInput, IVideoStreamInput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoFileInput, VideoInput, VideoStreamInput

    public interface IVideoInput
extends AutoCloseable
    Base interface for reading video and metadata.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open(String url)
   throws IOException
        Open video for reading.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the video to open
        Throws:
        IOException - if the video was not successfully opened

      • isOpen

        Check if the video is open.
        Returns:

    throws IOException
